statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com', password='new_password' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age=25, custom_settings='{"theme":"dark","notifications":true}' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET last_name='Smith', age=25, profile_picture_url='https://example.com/profile.jpg' WHERE username='jsmith';
UPDATE user_profiles SET display_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE user_settings SET timezone = 'GMT+2', notification_settings = '{"email": true, "push": false}' WHERE user_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET display_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_settings SET theme = 'Dark', notification_settings = '{"email": true, "push": false}' WHERE user_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-5e6f-abcdef123456';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Settings SET notifications_enabled = true, theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Settings SET notifications_enabled = true, language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE settings SET notifications_enabled = false, theme = 'Dark' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 35, gender = 'Other' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE settings SET theme = 'Dark', language = 'Spanish', notifications_enabled = false WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET username = 'JohnDoe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE profiles SET bio = 'Tech enthusiast and avid learner' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE profiles SET bio='Passionate developer who loves coding' WHERE user_id=3;
